sense.gloss: field, table, area in which cards are laid out (in a card game)
market (financial, stock, domestic, etc.), marketplace, exchange
actual spot, scene (of a crime, accident, etc.)
(on) site, (on) the ground, (in) the field, job site
assembly hall, meeting place, venue, site, grounds
scene, setting, place (where something happens), scenario, case
one's post, place of work, workplace
reputation (according to conventional wisdom), estimation, esteem
public square, square, plaza, piazza, forum
listing (on the stock exchange, etc.), taking (a company) public
performance (of a play, opera, etc.), staging, presentation
selling area, counter, section, department, sales floor
favorable time to sell, good time to sell
dojo, hall used for martial arts training
manda (place of Buddhist practice or meditation, esp. the place under the bodhi tree where Buddha attained enlightenment)
one's time (e.g. to go on stage), one's turn
place, spot, grounds, arena, stadium, range, course
stopping place for horse-drawn carriages and rickshaws (Edo period), high way resting place

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓より↑有利↑↓ゆうり↓な↑立場↑↓たちば↓にあるものね。
sdata.e: You're in better shape than I am.

sdata.j: ↑最悪↑↓さいあく↓の↑場合↑↓ばあい↓を↑考↑↓かんが↓えておこう。
sdata.e: Let's consider the worst that could happen.

sdata.j: あなたは↑他↑↓ほか↓の↑誰↑↓だれ↓も↑見↑↓み↓ていなかった↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓で↑私↑↓わたし↓を↑見↑↓み↓つけた。
sdata.e: You found me where no one else was looking.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓かを↑証明↑↓しょうめい↓しようとする↑場合↑↓ばあい↓、それが↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓であるという↑確信↑↓かくしん↓を↑持↑↓も↓つことは↑何↑↓なん↓らかの↑手助↑↓てだす↓けになる。
sdata.e: When you're trying to prove something, it helps to know it's true.

sdata.j: この↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓には↑不思議↑↓ふしぎ↓な↑雰囲気↑↓ふんいき↓がある。
sdata.e: This place has a mysterious atmosphere.

sdata.j: ↑風呂場↑↓ふろば↓はどこですか。
sdata.e: Where is the bathroom?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑安全↑↓あんぜん↓な↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓にいる。
sdata.e: You are in a safe place.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓に↑似↑↓に↓ている。
sdata.e: Your situation is analogous to mine.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓は↑十分↑↓じゅうぶん↓に↑理解↑↓りかい↓している。
sdata.e: I understand your position perfectly.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑立場↑↓たちば↓でも、↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑事↑↓じ↓をするでしょう。
sdata.e: If I were in your situation, I would do the same thing.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓だったら、↑私↑↓わたし↓も↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑事↑↓じ↓をするだろう。
sdata.e: If I were in your situation, I would do the same thing.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑服装↑↓ふくそう↓は↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓にそぐわない。
sdata.e: Your dress is unsuitable for the occasion.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑場合↑↓ばあい↓は↑例外↑↓れいがい↓としよう。
sdata.e: We will make an exception of your case.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑困難↑↓こんなん↓な↑立場↑↓たちば↓を↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑説明↑↓せつめい↓しなさい。
sdata.e: Explain to him the difficult situation you are in.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑言↑↓い↓ったことはこの↑場合↑↓ばあい↓に↑当↑↓あ↓てはまらない。
sdata.e: What you said does not apply to this case.

sdata.j: あなたの↑言↑↓い↓ったことはこの↑場合↑↓ばあい↓↑当↑↓あ↓てはまらない。
sdata.e: What you said does not apply to this case.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑言↑↓い↓ったことはこの↑場合↑↓ばあい↓にも↑当↑↓あ↓てはまる。
sdata.e: What you said is also true of this case.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓とであった↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓のことをよく↑考↑↓かんが↓えるんだ。
sdata.e: I often think about the place where I met you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓たち↑二↑↓に↓↑人↑↓にん↓がそんな↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓へ↑行↑↓い↓くことを↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑好↑↓この↓まない。
sdata.e: I don't like both of you going to such a place.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓たち２↑人↑↓にん↓がそんな↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓へ↑行↑↓い↓くなんて↑気↑↓き↓に↑入↑↓い↓らないな。
sdata.e: I don't like both of you going to such a place.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓たちの↑意見↑↓いけん↓はそれぞれ↑一長一短↑↓いっちょういったん↓があるようだし、どちらが↑良↑↓よ↓いのかこの↑場↑↓ば↓では↑判断↑↓はんだん↓できないよ。
sdata.e: There are merits and demerits to both your opinions so I'm not going to decide right away which to support.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓に↑立↑↓た↓たされたらどうするかね。
sdata.e: What would you do if you were in my place?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓にあったら、どうするかね。
sdata.e: What would you do if you were in my place?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓だったら、どうするかね。
sdata.e: What would you do if you were in my place?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑場合↑↓ばあい↓だったらどうするつもりだい。
sdata.e: What would you do if you were in my place?

sdata.j: あなたが↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓にいたら、↑何↑↓なに↓をしますか。
sdata.e: What would you do if you were in my place?

sdata.j: もし↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓なら、↑君↑↓きみ↓はどうする？
sdata.e: What would you do if you were in my place?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓だったら、どうしたか↑考↑↓かんが↓えてほしい。
sdata.e: I would like you to think about what you would have done in my place.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑場合↑↓ばあい↓だったらどうするつもりだい。
sdata.e: What would you do in my place?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓に↑立↑↓た↓ってごらん。
sdata.e: Imagine yourself to be in his place.
